words.def: a public act of violence by an unruly mob
A pancake-like Caribbean pastry, usually stuffed with curry.
someone new to a field or activity
a ring-shaped surface generated by rotating a circle around an axis that does not intersect the circle
the cardinal number that is the sum of one and one and one
a state of decay usually accompanied by an offensive odor

a prominent rock or pile of rocks on a hill
the branch of engineering that deals with the use of computers and telecommunications to retrieve and store and transmit information
A working-class punk rock  subgenre of the 1970s, sometimes associated with racism.
a state in northwestern United States on the Pacific
a light strong grey lustrous corrosion-resistant metallic element used in strong lightweight alloys (as for airplane parts)
Toward a closed, touching or engaging position.
